Release Date: January 6, 1957
Since some stations were consistent takers of our previous french-speaking series,
and since some stations serve a french-speaking area, this series is offered as
a bonus series.
This series contains 13 half-hour productions of original French plays, each
preceeded by a brief summary in English.
